org.vadere.state.attributes.scenario

Class AttributesHorse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vadere.state.attributes.Attributes
      • org.vadere.state.attributes.scenario.AttributesScenarioElement
        • org.vadere.state.attributes.scenario.AttributesDynamicElement
          • org.vadere.state.attributes.scenario.AttributesAgent
            • org.vadere.state.attributes.scenario.AttributesHorse

  • public class AttributesHorse
extends AttributesAgent
    This class defines properties of a horse. These are the height, width, direction, form and further shape properties. It inherits from the AttributesAgent class and is thus a dynamic moving scenario element for the simulation which contains all necessary properties to move over the simulation map.

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Getter for the radius of the horse. Since it is an ellipse and needs another interpretation of a radius, the greatest value from the axes of the horse will be taken as the radius. //TODO: This is a workaround, since the dynamic elements are still too much fitted to the pedestrian shape
        Overrides:
        getRadius in class AttributesAgent
        Returns:
        the width or the length of the horse, dependent which is greater
